ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.AbstractEntity
      ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.Platformer
          ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
public class Player
extends Platformer

This class extends Platformer to allow for an animated character, with specific actions/animations mapped to user input, with Platformer dynamics and physical body representation

Version:
1.5
Author:
Christopher Keefer

public Player(float x,
              float y,
              int shapeType,
              net.phys2d.math.Vector2f dimensions,
              float mass,
              float restitution,
              float friction,
              net.phys2d.math.Vector2f maxVelocity,
              boolean rotatable,
              int zOrder,
              org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet spriteSheet,
              java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,org.newdawn.slick.Animation> animTable)
Builds a Platformer with the passed spriteSheet, and the animTable passed; animTable must contain, at minimum: Run, Stand, Hurt, StrongStrike, Crawl, Leap, InAir, Falling, Landed, WeakStrike, Climb, Fallen, Slide, Idle, Kick, Stopping

Description copied from interface: Entity
Update this entity. This method is called once before physical world is updated each cycle. It is only ever called once per update.
